title: Hinduja Leyland Finance to go public via reverse merger with NXTDigital
description: The merger will make HLF an NBFC, said KM Balaji, chief financial officer, Ashok Leyland. The current book value of HLF is Rs 3,200 crore-based on Ashok Leyland's holding rate of Rs 60 per share in the balance sheet but when it gets listed, it could be much higher, he said.
